scripts.build:web: npm run web:export -w @viajes-ead/app && shx rm -rf firebase/hosting/public && shx mkdir -p firebase/hosting/public && shx cp -r packages/app/dist/* firebase/hosting/public/
scripts.qa:prepare: npm ci && npm run build:web && npm run build -w @viajes-ead/functions
scripts.qa:serve:hosting: npm run build:web && (cd firebase && npx firebase emulators:start --only hosting --project default --config firebase.json)
scripts.qa:serve:functions: npm run build -w @viajes-ead/functions && (cd firebase && npx firebase emulators:start --only functions --project default --config firebase.json)
scripts.qa:serve:all: npm run qa:prepare && npm run emulators:start -w @viajes-ead/functions
scripts.deploy:hosting:prod: npm run build:web && (cd firebase && npx firebase deploy --only hosting --project default --config firebase.json)
